answerText: Amerika[10] Amerika was written by this author of "The Trial" who wrote about Gregor Samsa turning into a giant insect in his Metamorphosis.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Minnesota A and Dartmouth A and South Detroit University | 16 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work expanded on its author's short work "The Stoker." For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this unfinished work, at whose end Karl Rossmann finds employment with the Natural Theatre Company in Oklahoma. Earlier, he worked at the Hotel Occidental and gets into arguments with Delamarche and Robinson.
